reviewText: I found this film to be one of the greatest in the "large woman" genre of films.  It was in the great tradition of ipressionistic film makers of the 1920's. With shots having a seemingly Hitchcockian flair I  found it difficult to take my eyes off of the screen.  This is a film which  will define all large lady adult films.  I highly recomend it.  Be sure to  have some puffs plus handy for this one.

This movie was excellent.  This has some of the finest cinematography ever produced in the genre.  I watched this movie with several women who found the movie to be an engrossing film with many plot twists and well developed  characters.  I recommend this movie to anyone with a quick 5 minutes on  their hands (literally).
